   contain the root `toctree` directive.

======================================
Welcome to the NI4AI Blog!
======================================

About NI4AI
===========
**Short for:** A National Infrastructure for AI on the Grid

**Contributors:** PingThings, UC Berkeley, Dominion Energy, and anyone interested in getting involved.

**Funding:** ARPA-E Open Innovation 2018

**Objectives:** Advance the use of time series data for the energy sector by

1. providing open access to PingThings PredictiveGrid platform.
2. hosting open access time series data capturing relevant dynamics.
3. fostering community around exchange of ideas, methods, and insights gained.

.. toctree::
   :caption: Learn More
   :maxdepth: 1

   home/index
   blog/index
   workshops/index
   tutorials/index

.. meta::
    :description lang=en:
        Educational content designed to build familiarity with synchrophasor and time series data analysis methods.
